alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued March 14 at 7:07AM EDT until March 14 at 9:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...One to two feet of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Northeast Suffolk and Southeast Suffolk Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM EDT Tuesday. * COASTAL FLOOD IMPACTS...Minor to locally moderate flooding is expected in the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Some roads and low lying properties including parking lots, parks, lawns, and homes and businesses with basements near the waterfront will experience minor flooding. Some road closures are possible especially along the western Peconic Bay west to Riverhead, and vehicles parked in vulnerable areas near the waterfront could become flooded. * SHORELINE IMPACTS...Breaking waves of 6 to 8 ft near the oceanfront, and 2 to 4 ft near Orient Point, and Fishers Island, will result in beach erosion and flooding, particularly near Orient Point. Waves splashing over bulkheads and seawalls may locally aggravate flooding of vulnerable shoreline roadways and structures. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. PECONIC RIVER AT RIVERHEAD NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 5.7 FT, MODERATE 6.4 FT, MAJOR 7.2 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 2.3 FT, MODERATE 3.0 FT, MAJOR 3.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 14/06 AM 6.2/ 6.8 2.8/ 3.4 3.0/ 3.5 1 MODERATE 14/06 PM 3.9/ 4.4 0.5/ 1.0 1.5/ 2.0 1-2 NONE 15/07 AM 4.2/ 4.7 0.9/ 1.4 1.0/ 1.5 2 NONE 15/07 PM 3.9/ 4.4 0.5/ 1.0 1.5/ 2.0 2 NONE 16/08 AM 4.5/ 5.0 1.1/ 1.6 1.3/ 1.8 1 NONE 16/08 PM 4.2/ 4.7 0.8/ 1.3 1.7/ 2.2 0-1 NONE ORIENT HARBOR AT ORIENT POINT NY MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
